FeaturesSectionForOnePlan.title: Say goodbye to storage constraints!
description: With a 5TB lifetime plan, you can store and access your files locally without consuming your device’s physical drive space.
Enjoy peace of mind knowing your memories and important documents are safely backed up in the cloud, accessible on any device.

WhyChooseInternxtForOneplan.title: Protect your files for a lifetime with unparalleled security built-in
WhyChooseInternxtForOneplan.description: We provide the best security to protect your files at all costs.

cards.title: Unmatched privacy
cards.description: Protecting your privacy is our top priority; we never store passwords or personal data. Your files are encrypted in transit and at rest, giving you complete control over your information.

cards.title: Uncompromising security
cards.description: Your files are end-to-end encrypted before ever leaving your device. Thanks to zero-knowledge and post-quantum encryption, you are the only one with access to your data.

cards.title: Open-source and transparent
cards.description: We are proud of what we do, so our code is made public on GitHub and can be personally reviewed, audited, and verified by anyone. We have nothing to hide but your data.

cards.title: Independently verified
cards.description: We’re wholly GDPR compliant and 100% safe, but don’t take our word for it. Internxt has been independently audited and verified by Europe’s leading penetration testing company, Securitum.

WhatWeDoForOneplan.title: Internxt ensures your privacy is protected
WhatWeDoForOneplan.description: We implement the best security to secure your files and documents:

features: Data secured at rest and in transit

SecondFeaturesSection.title: Protect your files for a lifetime with unparalleled security built-in
SecondFeaturesSection.description: We provide the best security to protect your files at all costs.

info.title: Security
info.description: Internxt utilizes the industry-standard AES-256 encryption for maximum security, both while your data is transferred and stored. We are also a zero-knowledge company, so you only have the key to decrypt your files. No third parties, not even Internxt, can access your files.

info.title: Secure file-sharing
info.description: Share files securely using encrypted links or email invites. Your files stay safe on your device, ensuring maximum security when sharing online. For extra protection, you can password-protect shared documents and manage access permissions anytime.

info.title: Access files from anywhere
info.description: Use our desktop apps for Windows, Mac, and Linux, or manage your cloud from our mobile apps for iOS and Android. WebDav support lets you integrate Internxt with your favorite file management applications.

info.title: Open-source and audited
info.description: We're committed to open-source development, making our code publicly available. Our commitment to transparency lets you see exactly how Internxt builds a secure platform that keeps your data private.

info.title: Secure backups built-in
info.description: Your data is encrypted and split into fragments, and multiple copies are stored across geographically distributed data centers throughout Europe. This redundancy ensures your files are always secure, no matter what happens.

info.title: Zero data collection
info.description: Unlike big tech companies that profit from your data, Internxt prioritizes your privacy. We never track, analyze, or sell your information to third parties. Your data belongs to you, and we guarantee to protect it.

one.title: Say goodbye to Google Drive, Microsoft OneDrive, and Dropbox once and for all. De-Google your life.

two.title: Get the world’s most secure cloud storage
two.description: Internxt’s zero-knowledge encryption gives you total control of your privacy.

PriceTable.title: Lifetime storage plans
PriceTable.subtitle: All Internxt plans come with complete access to our privacy-focused features. Secure your plan and your files with lifetime security.

freePlanCard.description: Get 1GB of encrypted cloud storage for free

FeatureSection.title: Secure cloud storage with unmatched privacy
FeatureSection.description: What makes Internxt so special? We’re a tight-knit team of professionals completely dedicated to protecting you online. Everything we do and every decision we make is centered on protecting your data from being exploited.

cards.title: Private by design
cards.description: We don’t store passwords or user data and all of your data is encrypted  in-transit and at-rest. Internxt puts you in full control of your files.  Your data is your business. Protecting it is ours.

cards.title: Uncompromising security
cards.description: Your files are end-to-end encrypted before ever leaving your device.  Thanks to zero-knowledge AES-256 encryption, you are the absolutely only  one with access to your data.

cards.title: Open source and transparent
cards.description: We are proud of what we do, so our code is made public on GitHub and can  be personally reviewed, audited, and verified by anyone. We have  nothing to hide but your data.

cards.title: Independently verified
cards.description: We’re wholly GDPR compliant and 100% safe, but don’t take our word for  it. Internxt has been independently audited and verified by Europe’s  leading penetration testing company, Securitum.

FeatureSectionV2.title: Take back control of your privacy
FeatureSectionV2.description: Internxt creates private and secure cloud services designed to put you, the user, back in charge of your data. Protecting your files and your fundamental right to privacy, all Internxt services are built from the ground up for unparalleled safety and security.

MostSecureSection.title: The most secure cloud storage for your files, photos, and more
MostSecureSection.description: Internxt Drive is an open-source, end-to-end encrypted cloud storage solution to store, back up, and share your files in total privacy. Internxt Drive offers award-winning encryption and control over your data.

faq.question: Can Internxt access my files?
answer: No. Internxt, along with any other third-party, cannot access your files, photos, or data.

Internxt’s services feature zero-knowledge encryption, meaning only you can access and decrypt your private data. Additionally, Internxt uses post-quantum cryptography, the most advanced technology available, to protect your files from future threats.

faq.question: Will I get access to all Internxt services?
answer: Yes, a paid Internxt subscription or lifetime membership grant you access to our all-in-one privacy suite, consisting of Internxt Mail, Meet, VPN, Drive, Send, Antivirus, and more.
An Internxt Free plan will only give you access to Internxt Drive.

faq.question: Does Internxt store my password?
answer: No. As such, Internxt does not (and cannot) store your password.
Your Internxt password is unique to you and used to encrypt and decrypt your Internxt data. But if you want to change your password, you can do so from our app.

faq.question: Can I enable 2FA?
answer: Yes. You can configure two-factor Authentication for your account through the Internxt web app.
You can also use Authy or any other 2FA tools to generate a personal 2FA code with Internxt.

faq.question: How do I create an Internxt account?
answer: To create a free Internxt account, simply click the best plan above and follow the instructions.

Or head to our homepage and click on “Get started.” You will instantly get 1GB of free storage for life with a free Internxt membership. You can use your free membership to access all our services. To sign up, simply enter your name and email address. No identity nor email verification is required to start using Internxt's services.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc). You can also pay via PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort and Cryptocurrency.

faq.question: What is Internxt’s refund policy?
answer: Internxt offers a standard 30-day money-back guarantee across all its paid subscriptions, which starts counting as soon as you subscribe.
And if you're ever unsatisfied with our service, reach out to us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com) and request a refund.

faq.question: How can I cancel my subscription?
answer: Canceling your subscription is simple. Open the Internxt app, navigate to settings, and select 'Cancel Subscription.' This action will terminate your subscription immediately, and your account will revert to a free plan.

Please note that any remaining time on your current paid subscription will not be refunded or carried over. For instance, if you cancel a one-year plan with four months remaining, you will lose access to those remaining four months.
You can also cancel a paid plan and your Internxt account via settings, which will delete your subscription, account, and all your files.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: Can't find what you're looking for? You can contact our Customer Success team via live chat or by sending an email to [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com).

faq.question: Does Internxt have lifetime plans?
answer: We offer lifetime plans which you can purchase from our website. These grant you lifetime access to our plans, with up to 10TB of storage for a unique, one-time payment.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can add as much storage as you want to your Internxt lifetime membership. Internxt lifetime plans are stackable. Simply purchase them with the same email address and contact us at hello@internxt.com so we can stack them together for you on the same account.

faq.question: Is Internxt a sustainable and eco-friendly cloud storage solution?
answer: Yes, Internxt is committed to green cloud computing, offering eco-friendly storage solutions to support a cleaner, sustainable future. Our data centers are powered by 92% renewable energy and are designed to minimize carbon emissions, resource consumption, and e-waste.
Our efforts contribute to a climate-neutral goal by 2050. [Learn more](https://internxt.com/es/green-cloud-computing)
